description: This file defines theming constants and styles for a Flutter application, including color palette, radius, spacing, and a custom theme data object with various style configurations for UI components.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: A class containing static color constants for brand, utility, and UI elements used across the app.

classes.name: Radii
classes.description: A class defining static constants for border radius values used in UI components.

classes.name: Spacing
classes.description: A class defining static constants for spacing values based on a 4px grid.

classes.name: RadiiExt
classes.description: A helper class providing additional radius constants not included in 'Radii'.

methods.name: oceanProfessionalTheme
methods.description: A ThemeData object configured with color schemes, text styles, and component themes to match the Ocean Professional branding and design specifications.
